requirements: Papers must not be simultaneously submitted for publication elsewhere.
Papers should be written in English.
Use Springer’s Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS) format.
Provide data for reproducibility of experiments in short papers.

scope_and_topics: Applications of formal methods in software/hardware design and testing
Specification and modeling languages for formal methods
Experience reports on teaching and industrial application of formal methods

publication.details: Accepted papers will be published in a volume of LNCS.
conditions: At least one author must be registered by the camera-ready submission deadline.
The registered author must attend the symposium and present the paper.
publication.special_issue: To be confirmed: a special issue in Science of Computer Programming Journal (Elsevier) with selected papers.
